item.title: Mass killings in 2025 in the US hit the lowest level since 2006
item.description: Seventeen mass killings have occurred this year in the U.S., the lowest since 2006

item.title: The Latest: Pope Leo ends first foreign trip with silent prayer at Beirut blast site, Mass at port
item.description: Pope Leo XIV has offered a silent prayer at the site of the 2020 Beirut port explosion as he wraps up his first foreign trip to Turkey and Lebanon
